name: Number Dungeon(Demo)
description:
本作為2D解謎動作遊戲

主角為不小心掉落到地下城的勇者，玩家必須幫助不會計算的主角找到通向下一層的道路。

測試玩家的記憶力與危機處理能力，保持冷靜才能完美的通關。

操作模式： 

移動:WASD

方向:滑鼠 撿起/拋出:滑鼠左鍵 

轉換地圖:空白建

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This game is a 2D puzzle action game. The protagonist is a brave hero who accidentally falls into a dungeon. Players must help the protagonist, who is not good at math, find the way to the next level. The game tests players' memory and crisis management skills, and staying calm is the key to a perfect clearance.

Game Controls: 

Movement: WASD 

Direction: Mouse 

Pick up/Drop: Left Mouse Button 

Switch Map: Spacebar
